topic.title: Performance is Slow Using With Remote Desktop

section.title: Problem
section.p: When trying to run in a Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) environment, the performance is slow and choppy.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Running a standalone version of over a slow RDP connection may result in performance issues. As a workaround, we suggest that you try to run as an Eclipse plugin when working with a slow RDP connection.
